text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)2x2. Interactive. Tall. Has to recharge between shots.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Sure, he's a hairy old man, but Coconut Cannon can still fire on all cylinders. The reason he's so hairy: he's in-between waxings.

pages.text: $(#25228d)Coconut Cannons fire when clicked, causing a medium explosion on projectile impact.
